name: cryptic-muse
description: Cryptic Muse - word pattern search server

scripts.build:init: copyfiles -u 1 app/* dist && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/bootswatch/yeti/bootstrap.min.* dist/css && copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist && copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist
scripts.build:js: mkdirp dist/js && browserify app/js/index.js -o dist/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:watch: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'

author: David Kilmer
